editor.label: Resource - @PLUGIN_KEY@ Clone
editor.description: Clone a virtual machine. Clone operation is ONLY supported and ONLY works when connecting against vCenter Server and not individual ESX(i) host.

formElement.label: ESX Connection:
formElement.documentation: The name of the configuration which holds the connection information for ESX server.

formElement.label: VM Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the virtual machine whose clone is to be created.

formElement.label: VM Clone Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the clone virtual machine which will be created.

formElement.label: Host for new VM:
formElement.documentation: Target host for the new virtual machine.

formElement.label: Datastore:
formElement.documentation: Name of the datastore. Default: Datastore with the most free space.

formElement.label: Number of Clones:
formElement.documentation: Number of clones to create (default is 1). If the value is greater than 1, a suffix is added to cloned VM names. The suffix consists of an underscore and the clone number ('_#').

formElement.label: JobStep Timeout:
formElement.documentation: Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
